Address.Address1: MIMAR MEHMET AGA CAD. AMIRAL TAFDIL SOK. NO: 19 - 58

Description.Text:
Avicenna Istanbul Hotel is a 19th century traditional wooden house which was converted into an elegant hotel in 1990 and fully refurbished in 2008. The hotel offers exclusive comfort and a comprehensive service with a personal touch. The luxurious fabrics of exclusive manufacture enrich the rooms with delicate combination of traditional and modernized Ottoman figures.

Throughout your stay you will discover the cultural riches of Istanbul while indulging in the well known Turkish hospitality. Thats aim: to include the perfect service touches in a wonderful setting that take and ordinary vacation to extraordinary memories. Avicenna Istanbul is a 19th century traditional ottoman style wooden house converted and opened 1990. Hotel has charming 48 rooms, total beds 106. 3 single, 19 twin, 25 double, 1 triple, with private bath or shower, hair dryer, mini bar, direct dial telephone, generator, satellite TV, wireless internet connection, air condition. Also some rooms have a balcony with wonderful sea view.A few minutes walk from the historical center of Istanbul in the shadow of the Blue Mosque, Saint Sophia Museum, Topkapi Palace and others.

Note: Property can provide transfer service from Airport. The price is 30 Euro from Ataturk Airport to the Hotel ( for max 3 people), 60 Euro from Sabiha Gokcen Airport to the Hotel (for max 3 people). Amenities includes Barbecue area, Dry cleaning, Lobby, Reception.

Avicenna Hotel is perfect choice to discover historical and cultural beauties of Istanbul,as it is situated just at the heart of Sultanahmet, the old city or the historical peninsula. One will be at the center of the three empires: Rome, Byzantine and Ottoman. All of these empires culture and historical heritages can be felt while you are walking on the streets of this historical peninsula. Topkapi Palace, St. Sophia, Blue Mosque, Church Hagia Irini, Covered Bazaar, Hippodrome, Spice Bazaar, Basilica Cistern, Numerous Museums and Historical Monuments are all located in the historical peninsula and all of them are in a walking distance from Avicenna Hotel. Tram and public city buses provide convenient transportation to any part of city. A lot of cafeteria, restaurant, gift store, grocery and many other shops can be reached in a few minutes. As Avicenna hotel is well located in Amiral Tafdil Side Street, you will not be disturbed by the noise of the street.

SINGLE - ROOM - Single Room offers Single bed along with Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, Ceiling fan, Color TV, Ensuite / Private bathroom, Hairdryer, Internet access, Iron / Ironing board, Laundry service, Mini bar, Non-smoking rooms, Room service, Safe in room, Shaver in bathroom, Telephone, Valet service and Voice mail.

The standard rooms with modernized Ottomoan decoration. The atmosphere of these pretty rooms makes the feel good luck as the meaning. These rooms equipped with LCD TV, Direct dial phone, smoke detector, private bathroom with hair dryer, evaporated mirror, phone and mostly with shower and a few tubes. Some of these rooms have a balcony. Two of them are connecting room. This is an ideal room type especially for the families with child. DOUBLE - ROOM - Double/Twin Room offers Double or two Twin beds along with Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, Ceiling fan, Color TV, Ensuite / Private bathroom, Hairdryer, Internet access, Iron / Ironing board, Laundry service, Mini bar, Non-smoking rooms, Room service, Safe in room, Shaver in bathroom, Telephone, Valet service and Voice mail.

The standard rooms with modernized Ottomoan decoration. The atmosphere of these pretty rooms makes the feel good luck as the meaning. These rooms equipped with LCD TV, Direct dial phone, smoke detector, private bathroom with hair dryer, evaporated mirror, phone and mostly with shower and a few tubes. Some of these rooms have a balcony. Two of them are connecting room. This is an ideal room type especially for the families with child. TRIPPLE - ROOM - Triple Room offers one Double and one twin or 3 twin bed along with Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, Ceiling fan, Color TV, Ensuite / Private bathroom, Heating, Internet access, Iron / Ironing board, Laundry service, Mini bar, Non-smoking rooms, Room service, Safe in room, Shaver in bathroom, Telephone, Valet service and Voice mail.
